alert.note: Alert for Knott; Letcher (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Letcher and southeastern Knott Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Colson, or 8 miles north of Whitesburg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Polly around 300 PM EDT. Whitesburg, Lucastown, Lester, Democrat, Deane, Southdown, Bellcraft, Crown and Marlowe around 305 PM EDT. Craftsville, Horn, Millstone, Farraday, Baker, Winters, Sergent, Ehkhorn Mine, Colly and Ermine around 310 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fleming-Neon, Neon Junction, Whitaker, Tolliver Town, Chip, Seco, Cromona, Wright, Thornton and Hemphill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
